title: White House at Inch Gow, etc. [A tale.]
author: Pitt, Sarah.
snippet: After that he was going on to Inch Gow, where he was to stay with Mr. Priestley for the remainder of the time. The White House was closed for the present, given up to the owls and the bats— metaphorically speaking. Even Mrs. Burnett had forsaken it.

title: White House at Inch Gow, etc. [A tale.]
author: Pitt, Sarah.
snippet: ISS The White House at Inch Gow.
